text: Mean Girls 2 is a 2011 American teen comedy television film directed by Melanie Mayron and written by Cliff Ruby, Elana Lesser, and Allison Schroeder. It is a sequel to the 2004 film Mean Girls. ==Other websites== * Category:2011 comedy movies Category:2010s coming-of-age movies Category:2011 LGBT movies Category:2010s teen comedy movies Category:American coming-of-age movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:High school movies Category:LGBT comedy movies Category:Movies about bullying Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Illinois
title: Mean Girls 2
